title: Do what you love (no excuses!)
description: At the Web 2.0 Expo, entrepreneur Gary Vaynerchuk gives a shot in the arm to dreamers and up-and-comers who face self-doubt. The Internet has made the formula for success simpler than ever, he argues. So there's now no excuse not to do what makes you happy.
author: Gary Vaynerchuk
keywords: TED, talks, Internet, business, entrepreneur, money, web
